data.message: Add regression tests for turn-bound intent (unbound denied, wrong turn denied): Added test_unbound_token_denied() and test_old_token_denied_after_new_turn() to test_layer6.py. Both tests pass and prove the fail-closed behavior: unbound tokens denied with "missing turn binding", old tokens denied with "wrong turn". Committed as b685ea7.
data.task: Add regression tests for turn-bound intent (unbound denied, wrong turn denied)
data.outcome: Added test_unbound_token_denied() and test_old_token_denied_after_new_turn() to test_layer6.py. Both tests pass and prove the fail-closed behavior: unbound tokens denied with "missing turn binding", old tokens denied with "wrong turn". Committed as b685ea7.
